backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with storage mixins, user profiles, posts, stories, messages, notifications, announcements, and related helper logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature requirements to affected frontend files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based CSS variables and theming rules for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React app root, metadata, icons, and main script entry point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and icons for installation.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching for static assets, cache cleanup, and offline fallback behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup configuring routes, startup behavior, authentication gates, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/announcements/An: UI component that fetches announcements and displays the latest one in a styled banner.
frontend/src/components/posts/CommentsDr: Drawer showing post comments, fetching author profiles and allowing users to submit new comments.
frontend/src/components/posts/CreatePost: Dialog for creating a post with text and optional media upload, including preview and progress tracking.
Floating action button that opens the create‑post dialog.
frontend/src/components/posts/FeedList.t: Fetches and displays the list of posts with loading, error, empty, and refresh states.
Renders image or video media with loading skeletons and auto‑play behavior for videos.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Full post card showing author, content, media, like/delete actions, and comment drawer.
frontend/src/components/posts/TrendingPo: Empty placeholder for a trending posts section.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Dialog to edit user profile fields and upload a new profile picture with preview and progress.
frontend/src/components/stories/CreateSt: Modal for creating a story with caption and optional image upload, handling previews, progress, and API submission.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoriesR: Displays story bubbles grouped by author with a create-story button and navigation to story views.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorBoun: Class-based error boundary that shows a styled fallback UI with error details and a reset button.
frontend/src/components/system/GlassSurf: Provides glass-style container components with configurable variants for UI surfaces.
frontend/src/components/system/NavIcon.t: Renders an image icon with automatic fallback to Lucide icons on load failure.
frontend/src/components/system/PageState: Reusable loading, error, empty, and skeleton UI components for page states.
frontend/src/components/system/PageTrans: Wraps pages with a fade-in animation keyed to route changes.
frontend/src/components/system/RoleBadge: Displays a styled badge for admin or owner roles using themed icons and gradients.
frontend/src/components/system/SplashScr: Full-screen animated splash screen showing the app logo and branding.
frontend/src/components/system/StartupSc: Startup phase UI showing progress or errors with appropriate icons and retry handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, reinitializing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes identity state to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/usePatchedActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on the current identity. Automatically invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin checks, user search, and other backend data using the patched actor. Handles auth-aware query enabling, retries, and error cases.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and defines a dark glassmorphism theme with custom variables, gradients, and utility classes. Applies global base styling and premium UI effects.
frontend/src/layout/AppShell.tsx: Implements the main authenticated app layout with navigation, user profile integration, unread counts, and periodic last-seen updates. Renders responsive nav content and wraps page children.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global CSS and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/access/AccessCodeGate: Renders a locked access-code gate UI that validates a user-entered code before unlocking the app. Manages input, error handling, and submission states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard page that fetches users, posts, and stats, providing actions for banning users, deleting posts, and creating announcements.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Controls routing between login, signup, and profile setup based on authentication and profile state.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen that triggers Internet Identity authentication and redirects on success.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ProfileSetupPage: Form for new users to submit name, class, and year, completing their profile setup via backend signup.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SignupPage.tsx: Signup screen that initiates Internet Identity login and allows switching back to login.
frontend/src/pages/home/HomePage.tsx: Home feed page displaying posts and providing a dialog to create new posts.
frontend/src/pages/messages/Conversation: Conversation view showing message history with a user, supporting sending messages and marking them as read.
frontend/src/pages/messages/MessagesPage: Messages overview listing conversations and navigating into individual chats.
frontend/src/pages/notifications/Notific: Displays user notifications, handles marking them as read, and shows loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Implements a multi-slide onboarding flow with images, navigation, and completion handling.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfilePage.t: Shows a user's profile with avatar, role badge, bio, posts, and edit or message actions depending on ownership.
frontend/src/pages/search/SearchPage.tsx: Provides a debounced user search with results, loading skeletons, and navigation to profiles or messages.
frontend/src/pages/settings/SettingsPage: Renders settings for profile management, theme switching, admin role controls, and logout features.
frontend/src/pages/stories/StoriesPage.t: Displays active stories, allows creating new ones, and navigates to individual story views.
frontend/src/pages/stories/StoryViewerPa: Implements a fullscreen story viewer with timed progress bars, navigation between stories, and author info display.
frontend/src/utils/accessCodeGate.ts: Provides localStorage utilities to validate, unlock, and lock the app using a fixed access code.
frontend/src/utils/onboarding.ts: Tracks onboarding completion status in localStorage with simple read/write helpers.
frontend/src/utils/pwa.ts: Registers a service worker on page load and logs update availability or registration errors.
frontend/src/utils/startup.ts: Defines startup phases and error handling helpers, including timeouts, logging, and error classification.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Formats timestamps into relative time strings and determines online status based on recent activity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and shadows for the frontend UI theme.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, and existing feature requirements for fixing intermittent profile load errors.
